description:
The death of an Archdemon sends waves throughout the world of sorcerers. As his estate is auctioned off, an elf woman goes up for sale, and the sorcerer Zagan is stricken with love at first sight.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: First Love Is Like a Nasty Disease That Everyone Catches Once
Hatsukoi to wa Dare mo ga Ichido wa Kakaru Shitsu no Warui Yamai de Aru
Le premier amour est un mal qui n’épargne personne
初恋とは誰もが一度はかかる質の悪い病である
